title: Meeting Action Items
description: Extracted action items from a meeting transcript

meeting_date.description: The date of the meeting in YYYY-MM-DD format

participants.description: List of meeting participants ordered by who spoke the most

speaking_count.description: Approximate number of times this person spoke

action_items.description: List of action items from the meeting

title.description: Action item title. Format: 'AI - [FU - ]<up to 10 word summary>'. Use 'FU - ' prefix only if assigned to someone else, not if assigned to the requester.

assigned_to.description: Person responsible for this action item, or 'Self' if assigned to the meeting transcript requester

summary.description: Brief summary of the action item (up to 10 words)

description.description: Full description of the action item (up to 1 paragraph)

mentioned_in_context.description: The time or context in the meeting where this was discussed
